alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 5:50AM CDT until June 18 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Union County in south central Arkansas... Southern Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... Northern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 550 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bussey to Cullen to 6 miles east of Belcher, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springhill, Homer, Haynesville, Cullen, Plain Dealing, Cotton Valley, Sarepta, Taylor, Emerson, Belcher, Shongaloo, Bussey, Smithland, Atlanta, Wesson, Macedonia, Welcome, Calhoun, Evergreen and Alden Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
